DOC.brief_summary: To investigate in renal transplant recipients the potential drug intreaction between Sirolimus, Mycophenolt Mofetil and Fluvastatin All patient enrolled in this PKI-Study had no changes in the therapy before or because of the study. Only patients without changes more than 4 weeks before startin the study were included
DOC.brief_title: Investigation of the Steady State Pharmacokinetics of Sirolimus, Mycophenolat Mofetil and Fluvastatin After Renal Transplantation
